statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE back_in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity <= 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE back_in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY id
SELECT name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'S%' OR name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE back_in_stock = FALSE ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, stock FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, stock FROM products WHERE stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT id, message FROM notifications ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, stock FROM products WHERE stock > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, notifications.message FROM products JOIN notifications ON products.id = notifications.product_id;
SELECT id, name, stock FROM products WHERE stock <= 10 ORDER BY stock ASC, name;
SELECT id, name, notifications.message FROM products LEFT JOIN notifications ON products.id = notifications.product_id WHERE notifications.id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM product_table;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_table ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_table WHERE back_in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM notification_table WHERE notification_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, notification_message, notification_timestamp FROM product_table JOIN notification_table ON product_table.product_id = notification_table.product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_table WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, back_in_stock FROM product_table WHERE back_in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_table WHERE stock_quantity < 10 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, notification_message FROM product_table JOIN notification_table ON product_table.product_id = notification_table.product_id;
SELECT product_name, trigger_type FROM product_table JOIN trigger_table ON product_table.product_id = trigger_table.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE is_back_in_stock = true;
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity, is_back_in_stock FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT notifications.product_id, notifications.message, products.name FROM notifications JOIN products ON notifications.product_id = products.id;

SELECT products.name, stock_updates.previous_quantity, stock_updates.new_quantity FROM stock_updates JOIN products ON stock_updates.product_id = products.id WHERE stock_updates.update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE is_back_in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT notification_id, product_id, notification_message FROM stock_notifications ORDER BY notification_sent DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT subscription_id, user_id, trigger_id FROM user_subscriptions LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, is_back_in_stock FROM products WHERE is_back_in_stock = true;
SELECT u.username, s.trigger_id, t.trigger_name FROM users u JOIN user_subscriptions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN triggers t ON s.trigger_id = t.trigger_id;
SELECT p.product_name, n.notification_message, n.notification_sent FROM products p JOIN stock_notifications n ON p.product_id = n.product_id ORDER BY n.notification_sent DESC;
